title: Quantum Confinement in Semiconductor Quantum Dots
abstract: We investigate discrete energy levels and electronic properties in III-V semiconductor quantum dots, exploring quantum confinement effects, exciton recombination, and the impact on optoelectronic devices. Our results show strong size-dependent photoluminescence, with potential for single-photon sources in quantum information processing.

title: Machine Learning-Assisted Quantum Dot Lithography
abstract: We apply deep graph neural networks to atomically precise lithography with scanning probe microscopy, achieving robust feature recognition and significant speed-up in pattern transfer for silicon quantum dot devices.
